posts.post_title: WTB LOW GRADE T205 Hoblitzell or Wilhelm
posts.post_content:
I know this might be a long shot, but I'm hoping someone may be looking for a little cash for the upcoming auctions.  I'm looking for low grade T205 Hoblitzell "no stats" or Wilhelm "suffered".  When I say low grade, I will take grade of 1 or Authentic.  

r/
Frank
